product_name: Dynafit Beast 16 Randonee Bindings with 120mm Brakes - 2013/2014
long_description: Built for freeride skiers who want to reach the summit and top it off with an aggressive line down the face, Dynafit Beast 16 randonee bindings with 120mm brakes deliver top backcountry performance.
short_description: Built for freeride skiers who want to reach the summit and top it off with an aggressive line down the face, Dynafit Beast 16 randonee bindings with 120mm brakes deliver top backcountry performance.
